welcome_message: Established in the year 2011, Fast Track is one of the leading car rental agencies that offer exceptional car rental and leasing solutions to everyone touring or residing in France.
documents_required: What are the required documents for renting a car in France?
documents_required_description: The required documents differ for tourists or residents.Here’s a brief about the needed papers for renting your dream car.
documents_required_1: If you are a resident, you'll need:
documents_required_4: If you’re a tourist, you’ll need:
documents_required_6: International driving license that is valid France
about_us_text_1: Established in the year 2011, Fast Track is one of the leading car rental agencies that offer exceptional car rental and leasing solutions to everyone touring or residing in the UAE. Its unmatchable services landed it in a sturdy position with UAE residents in need of long-term leasing plans and supplied tourists with exactly what their plans demanded.
about_us_text_2: Fast Track’s main office is situated in Business Bay. It also has an office and a desk in Armani Hotel, Burj Khalifa, making it the only car rental company available there. It handles car fleets of the world’s most versatile vehicles a customer could ask for, ranging from low-budget economic and intermediate, to luxury.
about_us_text_3: With top manufacturers like Nissan, Mitsubishi, Toyota, BMW, and Mercedes, Fast Track harbors a wide array of vehicles that deliver nothing but supreme performance-to-budget experience in an impeccably slick form.
about_us_text_4: In addition to that, Fast Track’s collection of luxury cars is undisputedly among the best in the market. From top-notch manufacturers like Porsche, Ferrari, Bentley, McLaren, and Lamborghini, every ride is transformed into a complete display of fine luxury that is met with immense horsepower and eye-catching stylish design.
about_us_text_5: Whatever your preference may be, Fast Track’s fleets guarantee you optimal satisfaction and an unbeatable driving experience.
about_us_text_6: With a vast experience in transportation, Fast Track reaches the needs of just about any customer. Its experienced staff can accommodate and provide excellent customer service to suit the rental needs of many of UAE’s prime hotels, in addition to supporting air-conditioned electrical buggy services to many locations including the famous Italian restaurant Belcanto at Dubai Opera. Fast Track is the ultimate destination for your rent-a-car choice and we are amidst a very exciting project with one of the biggest real estate development companies in the UAE. The journey will forever be paved with exciting deals, offers, and announcements. We thrive on our customers’ satisfaction and always step on the gas when delivering the best services.
luxury_cars_paragraph_1: France is the proper definition of a luxury country! What better way to explore this magnificent city than with a luxurious ride that guarantees self-confidence and maximum driving pleasure?
luxury_cars_paragraph_2: Shift up a gear and make your trip in France extra special by renting our high-end Fast Track luxury cars. Enjoy features a notch above your average rental car, like a strong engine, comfortable interior, and sleek, eye-catching body style. Choose from an exciting selection of luxury rentals ranging from European to American classics, SUVs, sports cars, and much more. With Fast Track, you’ll be able to weekly or monthly rent the latest exotic models from top manufacturers such as Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, and Bentley, just to name a few. Hire a high-performance luxury car to make the journey as enjoyable as the destination.
delivery_and_collection_desc: Pickup and Drop off within Dubai is free, other Emirates will be charged please consult the counter staff.
security_desc: Security Deposit or AED 1500 AED for economy cars and 5000 AED for luxury cars, will be retained for 30 days, passport copy with visa page with entry stamp or Emirates ID copy and a valid driving license copy.
insurance_desc: All Vehicles are insured for UAE. In case of any accident or any damage to the vehicle, minimum insurance excess claim charges are applicable amount 2000 AED , a police report is mandatory, in case of absence of a police report, the full repair charge will be payable by the customer.
driving_liscences_desc: Customer must hold a valid international driving license from the country on whose passport the customer is traveling, for UAE residents, a valid UAE driver’s license is a must.
credit_cards_desc: We accept Visa or MasterCard credit.
age_restrictions_desc: The driver should be 23 years old and above and should hold the driving license for more than 6 months.
theft_protection_desc: The insurance cover is not included for theft protection.
toll_tax_desc: Toll tax will be charged @ AED 5 per crossing.
parking_fee_desc: Parking Fee to be paid directly by the customer at parking meters.
fines_desc: All Fines incurred by the vehicle while in the possession of the customer will be charged to the customer.
vehicle_prohibition_desc: All vehicles are prohibited to be used for racing, towing and off-road driving or any other activities considered against the UAE law.
vehicle_impound_desc: Customer will be charged loss of rent in case of the vehicle being impounded by the government authorities for any reason.
mileage_restriction_desc: Customer is allowed to drive 250 km per day and 5000 km per month any additional km will be charged 0.50 AED per km or 15 AED per km for Luxury cars.
non_coverage_desc: Loss and damage of personal belonging is not included.
driving_restrictions_desc: Vehicles are prohibited to be driven under the influence of alcohol or drugs. Emergency road services are available, please enquire at the counter.
petrol_desc: Vehicles are to be returned with the same fuel level as when it was hired; otherwise the customer will be charged for the difference.
rental_period_desc: Rental period is a minimum of 24 hrs.
additional_driver_desc: Additional driver fees AED 200 for each additional driver.
cancellation_desc: In Case of Cancellation before rented period full amount will be charged.
other_conditions_desc: The customer acknowledges that the vehicle was delivered to him in good condition and adequately fit for the purpose of use and should be returned back without any kind of alteration.
smoking_desc: Smoking is prohibited 1000 AED charges for smoking inside the car.
faq_1: Can anyone else drive the rental car other than me?
faq_1_desc: You are permitted to assign only one additional driver at a fee of 100AED
faq_4: Are insurance charges part of the car rental price?
faq_4_desc_1: All vehicles are insured in France, in case of any accident or damage to the vehicle, a police report is mandatory.
faq_4_desc_2: In case of the absence of a police report: You will have to personally cover the complete repair expenses.
faq_4_desc_3: In case the police report is obtained and is red: A minimum insurance excess claim charges are applicable with an amount starting at 1500 AED.
faq_4_desc_4: In case the police report is obtained and is green: No amount is issued.
faq_4_desc_5: Fast Track recommends paying for premium full insurance, which covers everything. Please refer to Fast Track for more info.
faq_5: What are the payment methods for car rental services?
faq_5_desc_1: You can pay by cash, credit card (we accept Visa or MasterCard), or Bank transfer.
faq_5_desc_2: A held amount (depending on the car’s type) on the credit card is applied during the rental period.
faq_6: Is there any mileage limit for the rented cars?
faq_6_desc_1: All customers are allowed to drive 250 km/day for daily rentals, 1250 km/week for weekly rentals, and 5000 km/month for monthly rentals. Any additional kilometers will be charged at a rate of 0.50 AED/km for the economy and intermediate cars. Please contact us for mileage limits on luxury cars.
faq_6_desc_2: Please note: that the vehicles are to be returned with the same fuel level as when it was hired; otherwise, the customer will be charged for the difference. The vehicle should be also clean from the inside and outside.
faq_6_desc_3: If the fuel level or hygiene standards are not met, you should pay for the cleaning service, fuel refill, or any damage that might happen to the vehicle.
faq_7: What are the steps for returning a car to Fast Track?
faq_7_desc: You should personally hand it over to one of Fast Track’s personnel. They will then do a complete checkup to rule out any damage. If the vehicle is in a car accident, you should submit the police report and all supporting documents. Any fees, fines, or Salik tolls must be paid before handing over the car. Once everything is cleared up, the car can be returned.
faq_9: What is the age to rent a car in France?
faq_9_desc: You should be 23 years old and above and hold a driving license for over 6 months.
faq_10: What should I do if a breakdown or an accident occurs?
faq_10_desc: You are required to obtain a police report on the spot and then contact Fast Track via the hotline so that the vehicle could be replaced by our team. Our experts are available 24 hours and at your service.
faq_11: What are the guidelines for driving a car in France?
faq_11_desc_1: There are a couple of rules that you’ll need to stick to when renting a car in the France
faq_11_desc_2: 1- Always pay for parking in public and private places.
faq_11_desc_3: 2- Don’t cross the speed limit because you will get a fine from the state.
faq_11_desc_4: 3- The driver should be 23 years old and above, and should hold the driving license for more than 6 months. If not, each case will be covered independently.
faq_11_desc_5: Please contact us for more details.
faq_11_desc_6: 4- Car seatbelts are mandatory for all passengers.
faq_11_desc_7: 5- Don’t use your phone while driving your automobile because your mobile will distract you.
faq_11_desc_8: 6- If you had an accident, always call the police to write a report. They will help you.
faq_11_desc_9: 7- Don’t ignore the traffic lights, or else you will get a big fine from the state along with other restrictive actions.
faq_11_desc_10: 8- Vehicles are prohibited to be driven under the influence of alcohol or drugs. Emergency road services are available, please enquire at the counter.
faq_11_desc_11: Follow these instructions and relish a satisfying vacation in the France with Fast Track!
faq_12: Who pays for parking a rented car?
faq_12_desc: You'll need to pay the fees if you’re attending to park your rental car. If you didn’t, you will have to pay a fine when the car is returned. This means it’s always better to pay it as soon as possible.
faq_13: Do I have to pay a security deposit?
faq_13_desc: A security deposit starting 5000 AED for luxury cars will be retained for 30 days.
faq_14: Why do I need a credit card for car rentals?
faq_14_desc: Credit cards are mandatory for security deposits. We accept Visa or MasterCard credit. The blocked amount is issued on credit cards and not on debit cards
faq_15: When will Fast Track refund the blocked amount to my credit card?
faq_15_desc: The security deposit is not charged to the card so there is no actual refund. However, it can take up to 30 days (or fewer, depending on the card provider or bank) for the block to be lifted. After that, the customer can use the blocked amount again.
faq_16: Will the credit card statement show the return of my security deposit?
faq_16_desc: You might get a message from your bank when the money is blocked. The blocked amount won’t be debited from the account, however. You will only see actual charges on your credit card statements.
faq_17_desc_1: Fast Track strongly urges all customers to follow the traffic regulations for personal and public safety and to ensure that they adhere to the law.
faq_17_desc_2: The most common traffic fines reported in the country include:
faq_18: Can a Fast Track car be used for towing a trailer or caravan?
faq_18_desc: All vehicles are prohibited to be used for racing, towing and off-road driving, or any other activities considered against the UAE law. Towing is a violation of the rental agreement and is not permitted under any circumstances.
faq_19: How can I locate the nearest Fast Track office?
faq_19_desc: You can know about our location by clicking the “Contact” tab. Alternatively, we are available for any questions or inquiries on our number.
faq_20: Can I pick up the vehicle at one location and drop it off at another?
faq_20_desc: Pickups and Drop-offs within Dubai are free. For the other Emirates, you will be charged. Please consult the counter staff.
faq_21: Can I drive my Fast Track vehicle off-road?
faq_21_desc: No. Off-road use is a violation of the rental agreement and is strictly forbidden.
faq_22: Can I extend the rental period beyond the initial booking?
faq_22_desc: Absolutely! You are free to extend your rental period anytime during the rental period. The extra renting days will be added to the overall rental fee. Please contact us beforehand so that the operation can run smoothly and hassle-free. at the pick-up location.
faq_23: If a customer has full insurance, do they still need a police report if the vehicle is damaged?
faq_23_desc: Yes. Police reports are mandatory in all cases.
faq_25: Do I need to notify Fast Track if a booking has been made but travel plans have been changed?
faq_25_desc: Yes, please make sure that bookings are modified if travel plans change. For this scenario, additional charges may apply. If the original vehicle pick-up schedule is altered or canceled, please make sure that the booking is canceled with adequate notice to avoid any cancellation or no-show penalties. In case of cancellation before the renting period, the full amount will be charged.
faq_26: Is there a refund available for unused days on a rental agreement?
faq_26_desc: Daily, weekly, and monthly rentals are not refundable. However, special cases may be studied further to resolve an agreement. Please contact us in such cases.
faq_27: What if my rented car gets impounded?
faq_27_desc: in case of the vehicle is impounded by the government authorities for any reason, the rental agreement will still be valid. However, you will be responsible for all the fines and tariffs on the car.
faq_28: Is smoking allowed in Fast Track’s vehicles?
faq_28_desc: Smoking is prohibited. Fast Track will charge you an amount of 1000 AED for smoking inside the car.
privacy_policy_desc_1: Fast Track Rent a Car LLC ('us', 'we', or 'our') operates http://fastrack.fr/ (the 'Site'). This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use and disclosure of Personal Information we receive from users of the Site.
privacy_policy_desc_2: We use your Personal Information only for providing and improving the Site. By using the Site, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
information_collection_and_use_desc: While using our Site, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to your name ('Personal Information').
log_data_desc: Like many site operators, we collect information that your browser sends whenever you visit our Site ('Log Data'). This Log Data may include information such as your computer's Internet Protocol ('IP') address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our Site that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages and other statistics. In addition, we may use third party services such as Google Analytics that collect, monitor and analyze this.
communications_desc: We may use your Personal Information to contact you with newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information that ...
cookies_desc: Cookies are files with small amount of data, which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a web site and stored on your computer's hard drive. Like many sites, we use 'cookies' to collect information. You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our Site.
privacy_policy_security_desc: The security of your Personal Information is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
changes_to_this_privacy_policy_desc: This Privacy Policy is effective as of 1st June 2021 and will remain in effect except with respect to any changes in its provisions in the future, which will be in effect immediately after being posted on this page. We reserve the right to update or change our Privacy Policy at any time and you should check this Privacy Policy periodically. Your continued use of the Service after we post any modifications to the Privacy Policy on this page will constitute your acknowledgment of the modifications and your consent to abide and be bound by the modified Privacy Policy. If we make any material changes to this Privacy Policy, we will notify you either through the email address you have provided us, or by placing a prominent notice on our website.
privacy_policy_contact_us_desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please
